name: Firelight Second Seal
text:
1 "Firelight" Tuner + 1 non-Tuner FIRE Monster
If this card is used as an Xyz material for the Xyz Summon of a "Firelight" monster you can treat this card as Level 4. If this card is Special Summoned: you can add 1 "Firelight Dual Sacrifice" from your Deck to your hand. If this card is in the GY (Quick Effect): you can place this card in your Pendulum Zone.
pendulum_text: If you control a face-up "The Firelight"; Once per turn, when a monster effect is activated (Quick Effect); you can negate that effect, and if you do, destroy that card.
